post:
INIZ is the ultimate destination providing top quality VPS hosting services. At a affordable budget and customers in mind our VPS hosting services is the best solution with complete control and root access.

INIZ happily operates with four locations with more launching soon, we currently have presence in Amsterdam, Netherlands (Europe) and in United States with enterprise nodes in Los Angeles (West Coast), Chicago (Central), New York City (East Coast).
